txt.en:
'I believe with this our preparations are complete. Wait, what is that sound?'

Enârshan pauses for a moment.

'Do you hear that, [placeholder]?'

Enârshan's eyes grow wide with anger.

'Orcs! There are Orcs here! They must have followed you from Khûn Sagaz!

'Remove these beasts from my home!'
Speak with Enârshan when you are ready to defend her home
Orcs have followed you back from Khûn Sagaz. Defeat them and protect Enârshan's home.

'How dare those foul beasts enter into my home! They deserve the end you gave them. Thank you for your help, though you were the cause of it.\n\n'We must bring an end to these Orcs who dare defile my waters.'
Defeat the Orcs who tracked you to Enârshan's home.
I believe with this our preparations are complete. Wait, what is that sound?
'How dare these Orcs come here. Come to my home!\n\n'Make these Orcs pay for passing through the waterfall!'
You have defeated the Orcs who followed your tracks. Speak with Enârshan to ensure her that the threat is gone.
